Dear Hagop,

 

Following below exchange we had on the subject request, we have ratified the same with our reinsurers and agreed as follows :

 

*	Taking into account the change in entity name from “Fitra International Saudi Company Limited” to “Chalhoub Group Arabia” A prorate refund premium shall be applied to the existing open cover of Fitra International Saudi Company Limited which will be subject to 75% Minimum Deposit premium applied on a prorate basis based on the Actual Turnover.  Kindly please advise us the actual turnover for the policy period incepting from 25-11-2021 till 31-07-2022 for the Premium adjustment and for the prorate refund

 

*	A new open cover shall be issued under a separate account for “Chalhoub Group Arabia” with same terms and conditions as per “Fitra International Saudi Company Limited” for a period of 12 months w.e.f.01-08-2022 subject to NKORL as on 10-08-2022

 

*	A new open cover shall be issued under a separate account for “L’Occitane Arabia for Trading LLC” with same terms and conditions as per “Fitra International Saudi Company Limited” for a period of 12 months w.e.f.01-08-2022

subject to NKORL as on 10-08-2022

 

Upon receipt of your feedback, we shall proceed with the account opening separately for “Chalhoub Group Arabia” and for “L’Occitane Arabia for Trading LLC” accordingly.

 

On a separate note, we apologise for the delay caused in this regard.
